text: Foster Sylvers Featuring Pat & Angie Sylvers is the second album by Foster Sylvers from the R&B; group The Sylvers, this time featuring older sisters Pat & Angie Sylvers. Released in 1974, it was produced by Jerry Peters and Keg Johnson. ==Track listing== #"Na Na Hey Hey Kiss Him Goodbye" – 3:59 #"I Got You Babe" – 3:40 #"Love Me Tender" – 3:05 #"Apples, Peaches, Pumpkin Pie" – 2:25 #"Hang On Sloopy" – 2:51 #"Stubborn Kind of Fellow" – 3:13 #"I Fall In Love Every Day" – 2:40 #"1-2-3" – 3:00 #"When I'm Near You" – 2:43 #"Caress Me Pretty Music" – 3:20 #"Montego Bay" – 2:38 ==External links== * Foster Sylvers – Foster Sylvers Featuring Pat & Angie Sylvers at Discogs Category:1974 albums Category:Foster Sylvers albums Category:Albums produced by Jerry Peters Category:MGM Records albums
title: Foster Sylvers Featuring Pat & Angie Sylvers
